full_summary:
**Solicitation for Octopus Software License Renewal**
=============================================

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00026060:T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM021149/26060
**Publication Date:** March 13, 2024
**Closing Date:** March 22, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting bids for the renewal of the Octopus software license from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025. The solicitation is open to eligible contractors who have registered with SSC's P2P portal.

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Selection Criteria:** No specific selection criteria are mentioned in this solicitation.

**Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:** This solicitation is open to contractors based in Ontario (with the exception of the National Capital Region).

**Delivery Regions:** The awarded contract will be delivered in the same regions mentioned above.

**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada

* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* Phone Number: 613-302-0766
* Fax Number: 613-960-6026

To submit a bid, contractors must register with SSC's P2P portal and follow the outlined submission process. Please note that submission through the P2P portal is mandatory, and all bidders must attempt to submit their bids through the portal.

**Bid Submission**
-----------------

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through SSC's P2P portal. The bid solicitation document can be downloaded from the following link: [link]/[link]. For bidding instructions and terms and conditions, please refer to the bid solicitation document.

Please contact Sandra Ladouceur at 613-302-0766 or 613-960-6026 (fax) for any clarification on this solicitation. However, do not contact the contracting officer regarding the bidding process, as it is strictly online.

The closing date for bid submission is March 22, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time). Bids received after this period will not be accepted. The awarded contractor will be responsible for delivering the required software licenses by April 1, 2024.
